titleStmt.title: SII 14.236: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 236. (A.R. No. 324 of 1908.) KURUVITTUṞAI, NILAKKOTTAI TALUK, MADURAI DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CHITRARATHA-VALLABHA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of Śrīvallabha is dated in the 16th year and the 171st day. It is connected with No. 229 of the 11th year of the king registering donations made by Māṅgāḍu-kiḻāṉ which are referred to here. These lands which had been taken up for cultivation by a certain Sarvakratukkaḷ had to be irrigated by a new channel but as the sabhaiyār of Śōḷāntaka-chaturvēdimaṅgalam objected to the digging of a new channel, the lands could not be cultivated. On the representation of Kāliṅgarājaṉ, the exchānge in respect of one plot of land recorded in No. 229 was cancelled and the lands were exempted from the payment of antarāyam taxes for four years.

ṉ Olaiyum potak kāṭṭaccoṉṉom . kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭikkoḷka veṉṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉār . Ivai ḻuṉaiyataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai parākkirama pāṇṭiya Uttara mantiri Eḻuttu .
This order was issued by the king to the Śrīvaishṇavas of the Tiruchchakkarattāḻvār shrine granting exemption from certain taxes for four years from the 16th year onwards.

ṅkāṭṭu nāṭṭu māṅkāṭukiḻāṉ coḻamuttaraiyaṉ kācu kuṭuttu Ivvūr sabhaiyār pakkal vaṭakarai yilun teṉkaraiyilum vilaikoṇṭu kuṭutta piramāṇappaṭi nilattu Ittevarkkut tiruppaṭi māṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatākak kulacekaramaṅkalameṉṉum peyarāl patiṉoṉṟāvatu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyākap paḻam pāṭakappaṭi teṉkaraiyiliṭṭa nilam patiṉeḻe Orumāvarai Araikkāṇiyum carvvakkirutukkaḷ kārāṇmaiyākak koṇṭu kālukkumeṟ kāl kallip payireṟṟiṉāreṉṟum kālukkumeṟ kāl kallalākāteṉṟum Ivvūr sabhaiyār namakku

yey kulacekaramaṅkalameṉṉum peyarāl veṟu mutalāka Ivvāḻvārkkey kārāṇmai mitāṭci mikutikkuṟaivuḷḷaṭaṅkat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyākavum Innilattukkup patināṟāvatu mutal naālāṭṭai nāḷaikku Antarāyan tavirvatākavu miṭṭu nam variyilār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyuṅ kāliṅkarāyaṉ Olaiyum potakkāṭṭac coṉṉom . tāṅkaḷ Innilaṅ kaikkoṇṭu tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷuñ cellappaṇṇak keḻvi
ppaṭiyum Uḷvarippaṭiyum kallilum cempilum veṭṭik koḷvatu . patiṉāṟāvatu nāḷ nūṟṟeḻupattoṉṟināl Ivai parākkiramapāṇṭiya Uttaramantiri Eḻuttu .
This copy was the order subsequently issued by Kāliṅgarāyaṉ to the Śrīvaishṇavas and the Dēvakaṉmis of the temple of Tiruchchakkarattāḻvār at Chōḷāntaka-chaturvēdimaṅgalam.
